scheme_name: Subsidy Scheme On Establishment Of 25 R.I.R. Birds' Unit For Scheduled Caste (Gujarat)
description: This scheme provides financial assistance to Scheduled Caste individuals for establishing a poultry unit with 25 R.I.R. birds to promote self-employment.
key_features: Subsidy of Rs. 6,000 for 25 R.I.R. birds unit

category_criteria: Applicant must belong to Scheduled Caste
eligibility.additional_criteria: Must be a resident of Gujarat

special_notes: Limited to R.I.R. birds for Scheduled Caste individuals
